331.27.text:

339.59.text:

347.45.text:

359.72.text:

364.63.text:
different model? And people responded. And
this group of people met for about a year

370.59.text:
and a half and figured out how to start their
co-op and got their business licence, wrote

378.64.text:
up their bylaws, got licensed by the state
of Washington, and opened their business.
